title: Bill Outlawing Online Suicide Assistance Would Open Sites to Liability
description: Bipartisan legislation in the House targets not only the online activity of individual users but also the website operators hosting it.
dc:creator: Gabriel J.X. Dance and Megan Twohey
media:credit: Ashley Gilbertson for The New York Times
media:description: Matthew van Antwerpen with his mother, Sharon Luft. He died by suicide shortly after joining a website where other members gave him advice and detailed instructions.
